games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. Duncan Robinson scored 18 points for the Pistons and Jalen Duren added 15 before being ejected when he ignited the brawl by hitting Moussa Diabate with an open right hand in the third quarter.

Nic Claxton scored 28 points and had 10 rebounds to lead the Brooklyn Nets to a 123-113 win over the Chicago Bulls on Monday night. Anfernee Simons scored 23 points for Chicago, which lost its fifth straight.
blurbs: ⬆️ Nolan Traore (BKN) played 32 min (season avg: 20). 13 pts, 3 reb, 13 ast.
📋 Guerschon Yabusele (CHI) made just his 2nd start this season. 3 pts, 2 reb.
📋 Anfernee Simons (CHI) made just his 3rd start this season. 23 pts, 3 reb.
📋 Jaden Ivey (CHI) made just his 5th start this season. 13 pts, 6 reb.
⬆️ Nick Richards (CHI) played 26 min (season avg: 10). 12 pts, 6 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Rob Dillingham (CHI) played 22 min (season avg: 10). 8 pts, 7 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Brice Sensabaugh made a go-ahead 3-pointer with 47 seconds remaining to lift the Utah Jazz to a 115-111 victory over the Miami Heat on Monday night. scored 22 points, Lauri Markkanen added 17, Kyle Filipowski had 16 points and 11 rebounds, and Ace Bailey also scored 16 for the Jazz, who won for only the fifth time in their last 23 games.
blurbs: 📋 Simone Fontecchio (MIA) made just his 4th start this season. 9 pts, 5 reb.
⬆️ Kasparas Jakucionis (MIA) played 32 min (season avg: 16). 20 pts, 3 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: ORLANDO, Fla. -- — Anthony Black scored 26 points, Desmond Bane added 25 and the Orlando Magic beat Milwaukee 118-99 on Monday night to snap the Bucks' season-long three-game win streak.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jericho Sims (MIL) played 28 min (season avg: 15). 5 pts, 6 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Anthony Edwards scored 21 of his 30 points in the first half as the Minnesota Timberwolves used a dominant second quarter to cruise to a 138-116 win against the short-handed Atlanta Hawks on Monday night. Newcomer Ayo Dosunmu , playing his second game after being acquired in a trade from Chicago, had 21 points off the bench as Minnesota led by as many as 31.
blurbs: 🆕 Asa Newell (ATL) made his first start of the season. 25 min, 2 pts.
⬆️ Corey Kispert (ATL) played 31 min (season avg: 20). 12 pts, 7 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: Trey Murphy III made five 3-pointers and finished with 21 points, Jeremiah Fears scored 14 of his 20 in the second half and the New Orleans Pelicans sent the Sacramento Kings to their 13th straight loss Monday night, 120-94. Maxime Raynaud had 21 points and career-high 20 rebounds — the 7-foot-1 rookie’s eighth double-double this season — for Sacramento.
blurbs: ⬆️ Maxime Raynaud (SAC) played 38 min (season avg: 23). 21 pts, 19 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Nique Clifford (SAC) played 37 min (season avg: 21). 10 pts, 5 reb, 6 ast.
⬆️ Dylan Cardwell (SAC) played 32 min (season avg: 21). 6 pts, 11 reb, 1 ast.
⬆️ Devin Carter (SAC) played 30 min (season avg: 12). 12 pts, 3 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: Donovan Mitchell scored 32 points, including two free throws with 0.9 seconds left after James Harden 's tying 3-pointer, and the Cleveland Cavaliers rallied to beat the Denver Nuggets 119-117 on Monday night. 4, scored 23 points in his Cavaliers' debut three nights later.
blurbs: 📋 Julian Strawther (DEN) made just his 3rd start this season. 20 pts, 6 reb.

games.summary: Gui Santos made a go-ahead layup with 19 seconds left and Al Horford stole the ball from Cam Spencer moments later after he rebounded a Memphis miss, and the Golden State Warriors rallied late to beat the Grizzlies 114-113 on Monday night.
blurbs: ⬆️ Gui Santos (GS) played 30 min (season avg: 14). 16 pts, 8 reb, 2 ast.
📋 De'Anthony Melton (GS) made just his 3rd start this season. 10 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Pat Spencer (GS) played 32 min (season avg: 15). 17 pts, 3 reb, 7 ast.
⬆️ Gary Payton II (GS) played 24 min (season avg: 13). 7 pts, 4 reb, 2 ast.
📋 Kyle Anderson (MEM) made just his 2nd start this season. 8 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: Jalen Williams scored 15 of his 23 points in the second half of his return from a 10-game injury absence, and the Oklahoma City Thunder snapped their two-game skid with a 119-110 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers on Monday night. LeBron James scored 14 of his 22 points in the second half for the Lakers, whose three-game winning streak ended with another ineffective defensive performance.

-- — Toumani Camara scored a career-high 30 points and shot 8 of 10 from 3-point range, Deni Avdija had 26 points and 10 rebounds and the Portland Trail Blazers used a huge third quarter to cruise to a 135-118 victory over the Philadelphia 76ers , who played without Joel Embiid on Monday night.
blurbs: 📋 Trendon Watford (PHI) made just his 5th start this season. 12 pts, 2 reb.
⬆️ Justin Edwards (PHI) played 25 min (season avg: 14). 12 pts, 4 reb, 2 ast.
